text: Essa ibn-e-marium ney dua ki kay aey Allah aey humaray perwerdigar! Hum per aasman say khana nazil farma! Kay woh humara liye yaani hum mein jo awwal hain aur jo baad kay hain sabb kay liye aik khushi ki baat ho jaye aur teri taraf say aik nishani hojaye aur tu hum ko rizq ata farma dey aur tu sab ata kerney walon say acha hai
